title: The Masked Saiyan
skills_text:
Place the top 3 cards of your deck in the Drop Area : If you place a black card in the Drop Area with this skill, this card gains (When this card inflicts damage to your opponent's life, they place that many cards in their Drop Area instead of their hand) for the duration of the turn. If a card of any other color is placed in the Drop Area, this card also gains +5000 power for the duration of the turn.
When your life is at 4 or less : You may draw 2 cards and flip this card over.
skills_back_text:
Place the top 3 cards of your deck in the Drop Area : If you place a black card in the Drop Area with this skill, this card gains for the duration of the turn. If a card of any other color is placed in the Drop Area, this card also gains +5000 power for the duration of the turn.
When this card attacks, draw 1 card.

title: Killer Sword Trunks
skills_text:
: (Play this card in Active Mode by sending the specified card from your Battle Area to your Warp)
(This card inflicts 2 damage instead of 1 when attacking)
When a card evolves into this card, choose up to 1 Battle Card in your Warp with energy cost of 3 or less and play it.

title: Quick blade Trunks
skills_text: (If you have at least 2 cards in your Drop Area, you can play this card by sending all cards in your Drop Area to your Warp. At the end of that turn, send this card from the Battle Area to your Warp. can be activated once per turn)

title: Encroaching Threat Masked Saiyan
skills_text:
This card can attack Battle Cards that are in Active Mode.
When you've sent 7 or more cards to your Warp, reduce the energy cost of this card in your hand and Warp by 1.

title: Power Aura Mira
skills_text:
(If you have at least 3 cards in your Drop Area, you can play this card by sending all cards in your Drop Area to your Warp. At the end of that turn, send this card from the Battle Area to your Warp. can be activated once per turn)
When you have 3 or more cards in your Warp, this card gains +5000 power. If you have 5 or more cards in your Warp, this card gains an additional +5000 power.
